page.title: 16Recreation+Leisure/Turnditch
page.content:
1 {Luncheon Club. }This is for people over the age of 60.They meet at the school each week on a Wednesday for a hot meal.
2 {Turnditch and Windley W.I.}meet on the second Wednesday of each month in the W.I.Hut. {Shottlegate W.I. meet at Shottlegate.
3 {Turnditch,Windley and Cowers Lane { Fellowship}organize special events outings and attractions throughout the year. The highlight of the year is the production of the village {Pantomine}.
4 {Turnditch and Windley Bowls Club { }is an indoor Bowls Club that meets on Mondays and Thursdays in the W.I.Hut or in the School when cold.
